Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). 2. Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes. 3. In a skillet, cook ground beef, onion, and garlic until beef is browned and onion is softened. 4. Stir in cooked rice, tomato sauce, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. 5. Stuff bell peppers with the beef mixture. 6. Place stuffed peppers in a baking dish. 7. Top with mozzarella cheese. 8. Bake for 25-30.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Global">eb81cf979755021069a3b6fce053af07</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Bell Peppers (4), Ground Beef (300g), Ri</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Stuffed Peppers</name> <nutrition>Calories: 300, Protein: 25g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 30g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1.
